title: Design Mine Dewatering System
description: A planning engineer designs a dewatering system for a new open pit mine, including sump locations, pumps, and pipelines.

tasks.description: Estimate the expected groundwater inflow and rainfall runoff into the pit over the life of the mine.
tasks.expected_outcome: A water balance model is created, showing the volume of water to be pumped.

tasks.description: Determine the required pumping capacity for each phase of the mine's life.
tasks.expected_outcome: The required pump sizes and number of pumps are calculated.

tasks.description: Design the layout of sumps, pumps, and pipelines on the mine plan, ensuring the system can be expanded as the pit gets deeper.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete dewatering system design is created.
